attributes.action: Reintroduce stricter controls on the sale of Alcohol.
attributes.additional_details:
I would urge Parliament to bring back stricter controls on the sale and consumption of alcohol, with drink related diseases and anti-social behaviour increasing in the under thirty age bracket since the introduction of extended licensing hours, there must be a connection between the two.
I believe that the more liberal approach  to drinking that is enjoyed on the continent has failed to work for the British population and cost the nation millions of pounds and many premature deaths.
